alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 1:18PM CDT until April 13 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian and Stone. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 115 PM CDT, Between 2 and 3 inches of rain fell earlier today. Residual flooding of low lying areas is expected to continue through the afternoon. - This includes the following low water crossings... Woods Fork at Woods Fork Road, Tin Can Hollow at Highway CC, Silver Lake Branch at Highway U, Bull Creek at Center Road and Tory Creek at Highway O. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nixa, Ozark, Highlandville, Crane, Reeds Spring, Galena, Shell Knob and Mccord Bend. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
